name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
While the pasta cooks, heat the olive oil in a pan and fry the pancetta until crispy. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and grated parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some of the cooking water.
Add the hot spaghetti to the pan with the pancetta and garlic, tossing to combine.
Remove the pan from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, adding a splash of the reserved pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A rich and creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken and a parmesan cheese sauce.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook the fettuccine in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then grill until cooked through. Slice into strips.
In a pan, melt the butter and sauté the garlic until fragrant.
Add the heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in the parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and chicken strips to the sauce, tossing to coat.
Serve immediately with additional parmesan cheese if desired.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir fry with a mix of colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat the sesame oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the garlic and ginger, sautéing until fragrant.
Add the broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and snow peas, stir-frying until tender-crisp.
Stir in the soy sauce and toss to coat the vegetables evenly.
Serve immediately, optionally with steamed rice or noodles.

name: Salmón Marinado/Ahumado Casero
description: Una receta fácil para preparar salmón marinado y ahumado en casa, ideal para aperitivos, ensaladas o sándwiches.
ingredients: 1.5 kg de salmón fresco de acuicultura en 2 lomos
1.5 kg de preparado para hacer salmón ahumado (disponible en Mercadona en botes de 750 g)
instructions: Retira las espinas de los lomos de salmón con una pinza.
Mezcla el preparado para marinar con la ralladura de naranja y el romero picado.
En un recipiente, coloca una capa de la mezcla de marinado, pon encima los lomos de salmón y cúbrelos con el resto de la mezcla.
Cubre con film transparente, coloca un peso encima y refrigera durante 24 horas.
Retira la sal del salmón, lávalo bajo el grifo, sécalo con papel de cocina, pincélalo con aceite y envuélvelo en film transparente. Refrigera otras 24 horas.
Transcurrido el tiempo, lonchea el salmón y consérvalo en porciones envasadas al vacío en el congelador.
